justification: "Participants completed a fraction comparison task. Instructions indicated that two fractions would appear on the screen, participants were to indicate which fraction was a larger value via a button press."

measured_by: reaction time in the fraction comparison task
justification: "We analyzed participant reaction time across all presentation styles. For trials with no delay, the overall mean was 1.70 s…"

measured_by: percentage correct in the fraction comparison task
justification: "For trials with a numerator delay, the overall mean was 1.22 s, with an overall accuracy of 95%."
